Class.name: CSPX.Dashboard.GridSeries
Class.Description: Defines a data series for a Dashboard grid This class is for internal use only.

Property.name: Property
Property.Description: Metric property providing the metric for this series. The Metric class is defined by the grid.

Property.name: Instance
Property.Description: (Optional) Metric instance name providing the data for this series.

Property.name: Label
Property.Description: Label displayed for this series; If not specified, <var>Property</var> is used.

Property.name: Data
Property.Description: (Internal) Holder for initial data for series.
